NK041(di)047:1: // smon lam rdo rje'i rgya mdud ni /
NK041(di)047:2: bla ma yi dam lha tshogs dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)047:3: deng 'dir brtson pas bsgrubs pa'i dge ba dang //
NK041(di)047:4: dus gsum bsags dang yod pa'i dge ba rnams //
NK041(di)047:5: bsdom ste bla med byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK041(di)047:6: deng nas byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
NK041(di)047:7: rigs bzang blo gsal nga rgyal med pa dang //
NK041(di)047:8: snying rje che zhing bla ma la gus ldan //
NK041(di)047:9: dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg la nges gnas shog /
NK041(di)047:10: dbang gis smin cing dam tshig sdom par ldan //
NK041(di)047:11: rim gnyis lam la bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin te //
NK041(di)047:12: dka' ba med par rig 'dzin go 'phang bgrod //
NK041(di)047:13: dngos grub rnam gnyis bde blag 'grub gyur cig /
NK041(di)047:14: cir snang sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i 'khor lor rdzogs //
NK041(di)047:15: grags pa thams cad brjod bral sngags kyi sgra //
NK041(di)047:16: sems kyi 'gyu ba rang rig 'dus ma byas //
NK041(di)047:17: bde chen 'du 'bral med pa mngon gyur shog /
NK041(di)047:18: nyams chag rtog sgrib ma spangs gnas su dag /
NK041(di)047:19: phyi nang gsang ba dbyer med rtogs pas bskangs //
NK041(di)047:20: gang shar rang grol kun bzang klong yangs su //
NK041(di)047:21: ngan song dong sprugs srid zhi mnyam gyur cig /
NK041(di)047:22: thig le chen po sku dang zhing khams rdzogs //
NK041(di)047:23: dam tshig chen po spang blang mtshan ma dag /
NK041(di)047:24: khyab brdal chen po re dogs mdud pa grol //
NK041(di)047:25: rdzogs pa chen po chos sku mngon gyur shog /
NK041(di)047:26: brgyud pa gsum gyi byin rlabs snying la zhugs //
NK041(di)047:27: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i lam gsang sems la rdzogs //
NK041(di)047:28: phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub pa yis //
NK041(di)047:29: mu mtha' med pa'i 'gro ba sgrol bar shog /
NK041(di)047:30: zhi khro sprul pa'i 'khor los lung ston zhing //
NK041(di)047:31: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis bu bzhin skyong ba dang //
NK041(di)047:32: chos skyong srung mas bar chad kun bsal nas //
NK041(di)047:33: yid la smon pa mtha' dag 'grub gyur cig /
NK041(di)047:34: rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang //
NK041(di)047:35: bstan 'dzin rnams kyi bzhed pa'i don kun 'grub //
NK041(di)047:36: ma lus skye rgu'i 'gal rkyen kun zhi zhing //
NK041(di)047:37: phun tshogs mtha' dag yid bzhin 'byor gyur cig //
